channel.title: Poor old 'The Game'. It died. Someone please lock this before I cry
channel.description: What a bummer, eh? The download link got broke at some point and I don't have the source anymore. Sorry guys. It was shit anyway. The housing and marriage systems were pretty cool but other than that you didn't really miss out on much. Just you wait till you see what I do with Project Pooeybum.

item.title: Poor old 'The Game'. It died. Someone please lock this before I cry
item.dc:creator: @Tatemo Tatemo
item.description:
@Tatemo wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:166, topic:304107”][quote author=Tatemo link=topic=400345.msg3967251#msg3967251 date=1333832802]

I have a copy on my other computer. I’ll re-upload if I remember

You’re alive? :eek:

Yes. Except I don’t know my password and I just found a computer I was already logged in on.
[/quote]
Can’t you have it reset/sent to your email? If only I had the privileges to do it for you.[/quote]

Found it. Luckily you can look at saved passwords on Google Chrome. If the download link is really broken, can you please lock this? I don’t have the source anymore so I guess it is gone forever I have a newer better one now though We should chat sometime.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

I’m not sure on it’s current state as I haven’t touched it in over two years, whether it’s working or not, and I don’t think it’s been modified to work with 64 bit systems so a little work may need to be done on your part.
Feel free to modify as you please, providing the appropriate credits are given.

http://s000.tinyupload.com/index.php?file_id=43989307152672554702
